Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.controllers.elements

Class PegController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.controllers.elements.PegController
public class PegController extends Object
The controller for GUI peg elements. Pegs are used to mark players' points on the board.

  • Constructor Details

    • PegController

      public PegController()

  • Method Details

    • setPegColor

      public void setPegColor(PlayerColor color)
      Sets this peg's color.
      Parameters:
      color - The peg's color. If null then the peg will be set to the color black.

    • setPegColor

      public void setPegColor(List<PlayerColor> colors)
      Creates a peg with multiple colors. The peg will be sliced in equal parts for each color. Useful when multiple players have the same amount of points.
      Parameters:
      colors - The colors of this peg.

    • setPegRadius

      public void setPegRadius(double radius)
      Sets the radius of this circular peg. The default radius is 13.3.
      Parameters:
      radius - The radius of this circular peg.

    • setInteractable

      public void setInteractable(boolean interactable)
      Sets whether this peg is interactable. An interactable peg has a mouse hover effect.
      Parameters:
      interactable - Whether this peg is interactable.

    • setSelected

      public void setSelected(boolean selected)
      Sets whether this peg is selected or not. A selected peg has a shadow effect.
      Parameters:
      selected - Whether this peg is selected.

    • setPlaceholder

      public void setPlaceholder(boolean placeholder)
      Sets whether this peg is a placeholder. Placeholder pegs are invisible.
      Parameters:
      placeholder - Whether this peg is a placeholder.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
      Returns:
      The root node of this peg element.
